txt.en: 'Everyone tells me what a help you have been today. If ever you decide to build a home in Gondor, come see me about sourcing your timber. I'm sure I could offer a more than fair price after everything you've done for us.'
Dervorin would like you to speak to Dornach.\n\nTalk to Dornach at the lumber camp, east of Ethring.
Dornach asked you to help folks around the lumber camp.\n\nComplete quests in the lumber camp.
Dravron has been arrested. The lumber camp has been handed over to the labourers, who know best how to operate it. Lumber is beginning to ship out to where it's needed at a more than fair price.
'Greetings, friend! This camp has languished for too long, and there is much to do. Speak with others around the camp and see what they need.'

'Dravron has been arrested and the lumber camp has been handed over to the labourers, who know best how to operate it. Now it falls to us to support them as best we can, so they can do what they do best for the benefit of all of Gondor.\n\n'Go speak with Dornach. He has taken charge of ï¿½
